Mumps (Test Panels for mumps virus IgM IgG Antibody)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org

    77250-9 Mumps virus IgG and IgM panel - Serum
    77398-6 Mumps virus IgG and IgM index panel - Serum
    88458-5 Mumps virus Ab.IgG and IgM panel - Cerebral spinal fluid by Immunofluorescence
    92929-9 Measles, Mumps and Rubella virus IgG panel [Units/volume] - Serum or Plasma
